sourcesContent: import{useState as e,useCallback as t,useEffect as i}from"react";function n(){let[n,r]=e(!1),d=t((()=>{document.hidden&&r(!0)}),[]);return i((()=>(document.addEventListener("visibilitychange",d),()=>document.removeEventListener("visibilitychange",d))),[d]),{hasTabbedAway:n,reset:()=>r(!1)}}export{n as useHasTabbedAway};
